machine_end_gcode:
M104 S0 ; turn off extruder
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M107 ; turn off fan
G90; set absolute
G1 X1 Y1
M106 P1 S0;
M106 P0 S0;
G1 Z305 F10000
G1 Y10 X10 F10000
SET_GCODE_OFFSET Z=0
BED_MESH_CLEAR ; clear kinematics
machine_start_gcode:
M117 Homing
M83  ; extruder relative mode

M104 S100 ; set extruder standby temp
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; set bed temp
{if filament_type[0] == "PETG-CF"}
SET_TEMPERATURE_FAN_TARGET TEMPERATURE_FAN=chamber TARGET=30
{endif}
{if filament_type[0] == "PA-CF" or filament_type[0] == "PA-GF"}
SET_TEMPERATURE_FAN_TARGET TEMPERATURE_FAN=chamber TARGET=40
{endif}
G28 ; home all
G0 Y150 X0 Z25 F10000; move to optimal preheat height
M106 S255 ; set part fan to max
M117 Preheating Chamber

{if filament_type[0] == "PETG-CF"}
TEMPERATURE_WAIT SENSOR="temperature_sensor chassis" MINIMUM=25 ; wait for chamber to reach temp
{endif}
{if filament_type[0] == "PA-CF" or filament_type[0] == "PA-GF"}
TEMPERATURE_WAIT SENSOR="temperature_sensor chassis" MINIMUM=32 ; wait for chamber to reach temp
{endif}

M106 S0 ; turn off part fan

M104 S[chamber_temperature]; set extruder to probe temp
G0 Y5 X5 Z5 F10000;
G28 ; home all
M117 Heating Nozzle To Probe Temperature
TEMPERATURE_WAIT SENSOR="extruder" MINIMUM=[chamber_temperature] ; wait for the extruder to get to temp
M117 Heating Bed
TEMPERATURE_WAIT SENSOR="heater_bed" MINIMUM=[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; wait for the bed to get to temp
G0 Z10; move to safe Z
M117 Stabilizing Temperature
G4 P60000 ; wait 1 minute for nozzle and bed temperatures to stabilize (PID overshoot, tip temperature)
M117 Probing Bed
BED_MESH_CLEAR ; clear kinematics 
BED_MESH_CALIBRATE ; probe bed
G92 E0.0 ; reset extruder position
G1 Y1 X0 Z5 F10000

M117 Heating Nozzle To First Layer Temperature
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] ; set extruder first layer temp
TEMPERATURE_WAIT SENSOR="extruder" MINIMUM=[first_layer_temperature] ; wait for the extruder to get to temp
M117 Extruding Priming Line
G1 Y1 X0 Z0.3 F10000
G1 Y1 F1000.0 ; go outside print area
G92 E0.0 ; reset extruder position
G1 X90.0 E12.0  F1000.0 ; intro line
G1 X200.0 E30  F1000.0 ; intro line
G92 E0.0 ;reset extruder position
M221 S100 ; set 100% flow
M117
name: Pantheon HS3 0.4 Nozzle
